meanings.sent1: The hypervirulent virus spread rapidly through the population.
meanings.sent2: The hypervirulent strain of bacteria caused a severe outbreak.
meanings.sent3: The hypervirulent flu seemed determined to infect everyone in its path.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like hypervirulent seeds, spreading rumors everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The hypervirulent disease was a silent but deadly threat.

meanings.definition: Characterized by an unusually high level of virulence or aggressiveness
meanings.sent1: The hypervirulent behavior of the wild animals startled the researchers.
meanings.sent2: The hypervirulent response from the enemy caught us off guard.
meanings.sent3: The hypervirulent squirrel fiercely defended its territory from other animals.
meanings.sent4: His hypervirulent competitiveness drove him to always be the best.
meanings.sent5: The hypervirulent storm wreaked havoc on the small town.
